content.rendered:
Aspen Homes Featured in Houzz

 

Houzz is an authority in the building industry, so here at Aspen Homes we were thrilled to be referenced in their recent article, entitled “No Reason to Go Grand When a Little Glam Will Do.” The piece pointed out the touch of elegance we created by using accent chandeliers in our remarkable home “The Ridgeline”. This custom Northwest home also received the People’s Choice Award in the Parade of Homes 2016, as well as the Distinguished Builder award. The full Houzz article is below, and it gives some great tips and insights on how to add a bit of glam to your home without breaking the bank. As always, we at Aspen Homes are honored to be recognized as one of North Idaho’s premier, and most trusted, custom home builders.

View the Houzz Article
